title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 89.3 - Redemption of deposit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 89.3 - Redemption of deposit

State Regulations

No licensee shall refuse to redeem any reusable container
of beer upon which a deposit has been paid, provided it is returned to the
original place of purchase in good order and condition, reasonable wear and
tear excepted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
89.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
